DOC.brief_title: A Double-Blind Trial Adjunctive Valacyclovir Improve Cognition Early Phase Schizophrenia
DOC.detailed_description: One hundred seventy-five participant ( N=70 HSV-1 seropositive N=105 HSV-1 seronegative ) randomize 1:1 receive adjunctive valacyclovir adjunctive placebo 16 week period . The primary outcome assess improvement change visual work memory score HSV-1 positive negative participant course study . We also measure overall cognitive functioning severity psychiatric symptom course study evaluate tolerability safety valacyclovir treatment population . In addition , explore relationship change level inflammatory marker ( HSV2 , CMV , EBV , CRP , Toxoplasmosis ) treatment response course study .
